text: Titanfall 2 is a video game made by Respawn entertainment released on October 28 2016. It was made for the Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and PC. It had a game in the Titanfall series made before Titanfall 2 which was called Titanfall. Category:2016 video games Category:Electronic Arts video games Category:Respawn Entertainment games Category:First-person shooters Category:Parkour video games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:Science fiction video games Category:Video games about time travel Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Windows games Category:Xbox One games
title: Titanfall 2
